QuestData.Title: Siege!
QuestData.Description: That Overseer Oilfist couldn't'a picked a worse time to ask me to join a fight. My summit's already under siege!$b$bIt's nothin' my guards can't handle, but still, it won't be easy for me to just pick up and send some dwarves into that infernal gorge.$b$bTell ya what: you take out their marksmen that're holding our fortress under siege, and I'll consider your offer. Ye'll find 'em slinkin' around the flats to the east.
QuestData.CompletionText: You'll have to do better than that, $g lad: lass;.
QuestData.RewardText: If nothin' else, you bought us some time, and some room to open up our supply lines through this siege.$b$bYer a fine $c.
